High-Protein

HIGH-PROTEIN RED VELVET BARS

A decadent red velvet protein bar with a cream cheese frosting, offering 22g of protein.

22g
Protein
270
Calories
35m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs20g
Fat16g
Fiber5g
Sugar8g
DifficultyMedium

INGREDIENTS

  • 1 can (425g) beets, pureed
  • 120g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 60g unsweetened cocoa powder
  • 60g erythritol
  • 2 large eggs
  • 60g unsweetened applesauce
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 120g cream cheese, softened
  • 30g powdered erythritol

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat oven and prepare pan

Preheat your oven to 175¬∞C (350¬∞F) and line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper.

2

Make the batter

In a food processor, blend the pureed beets, protein powder, cocoa powder, erythritol, eggs, applesauce, and vanilla extract until smooth.

3

Bake

Pour the batter into the prepared pan and bake for 18-20 minutes.

4

Cool

Let the bars cool completely.

5

Make the frosting

In a bowl, beat the cream cheese and powdered erythritol until smooth and creamy.

6

Frost and serve

Spread the frosting over the cooled bars, cut into 12 pieces, and serve.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
